parameters.name: CdnType
parameters.description:
The type of workload accelerated by Alibaba Cloud CDN. Separate types with commas (,). Valid values:

*   **web**: images and small files
*   **download**: large files
*   **video**: on-demand video and audio streaming

If you do not set this parameter, all service types are queried.

parameters.name: ChangeEndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

> The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: ChangeStartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: CheckDomainShow
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display domain names that are under review, failed the review, or failed to be configured. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: Coverage
parameters.description:
The acceleration region. By default, all acceleration regions are queried. Valid values:

*   **domestic**: Chinese mainland
*   **global**: global
*   **overseas**: outside the Chinese mainland

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain. If you do not set this parameter, all domain names that match the conditions are returned.

parameters.name: DomainSearchType
parameters.description:
The search mode. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy_match**: fuzzy match
*   **pre_match**: prefix match
*   **suf_match**: suffix match
*   **full_match** (default): exact match

> If you specify the domain names to query but do not set the DomainSearchType parameter, the exact match mode is used.

parameters.name: DomainStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the domain name. Valid values:

*   **online**
*   **offline**
*   **configuring**
*   **configure_failed**
*   **checking**
*   **check_failed**
*   **stopping**
*   **deleting**

If you do not set this parameter, domain names in all states are queried.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Valid values: **1** to **100000**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1 to 50**. Default value: **20**. Maximum value: **50**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. By default, all IDs are queried.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The information about the origin server.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The list of tags. Maximum number of elements in the list: 20
